name: Soot the Loot
description:
Submission to the Game Jam Develop to Help - Ukraine. The theme was 'Stronger together'.

You play as a group of soots following a successful adventurer back out of the dungeon, collecting the loot they have that just drops to the floor.

Github Project: https://github.com/Slideshow776/Soot-the-Loot

Home page: https://sandramoen.no

If the music isn't playing, press the 'R' key.
